name: Frank's Tale
description:
King Frank was cursed by the court wizard, and he is now an unrecognizable beast. Lucky for Frank, the curse makes him freakishly strong, and he grows even stronger by absorbing the energy of his foes. 

You control Frank and use his spin attack to destroy enemies and the environment. You continuously grow bigger and can destroy even more of the environment as you progress.

Can you destroy the wizard and restore Frank to his normal self?

This is my first game (outside of projects for an online Unity course I took), and is a submission for the Miz Game Jam 1 (https://itch.io/jam/miz-jam-1). There is a TON I'd love to have added/fixed before submitting but sadly could not - I suppose that's how it goes w/ Game Jams. Maybe if people enjoy it I'll give it a bit more love afterwards.
